    Huy, Tinh, Poudel et al. (2019)

    huy_2019.Rd

    Allometric models from Huy, Tinh, Poudel et al. (2019)

    Stem Biomass Models

    bs = a_1 * dsob^b_11 * hst^b_12 * es^b_13

    • bs [kg] - stem biomass

    • dsob [cm] - diameter of the stem, outside bark at breast height

    • hst [m] - total height of the stem

    • es [g cm-3] - stem density

    Model Parameters

      family              a_1  b_11  b_12  b_13
1 <NA>             0.0206  2.35 0.591 0.691
2 Dipterocarpaceae 0.0255  2.25 0.695 0.954

    bs = a_1 * dsob^b_11

    • bs [kg] - stem biomass

    • dsob [cm] - diameter of the stem, outside bark at breast height

    Model Parameters

      family           genus            a_1  b_11
1 Dipterocarpaceae Dipterocarpus 0.0183  2.76
2 Dipterocarpaceae Shorea        0.0392  2.47

    Branch Biomass Models

    bb = a_2 * dsob^b_21

    • bb [kg] - branch biomass

    • dsob [cm] - diameter of the stem, outside bark at breast height

    Model Parameters

      family           genus             a_2  b_21
1 <NA>             <NA>          0.00669  2.86
2 Dipterocarpaceae <NA>          0.0110   2.74
3 Dipterocarpaceae Dipterocarpus 0.00481  2.96
4 Dipterocarpaceae Shorea        0.0213   2.49

    Foliage Biomass Models

    bf = a_3 * dsob^b_31

    • bf [kg] - foliage biomass

    • dsob [cm] - diameter of the stem, outside bark at breast height

    Model Parameters

      family           genus            a_3  b_31
1 <NA>             <NA>          0.0370  1.68
2 Dipterocarpaceae <NA>          0.0456  1.63
3 Dipterocarpaceae Dipterocarpus 0.0892  1.44
4 Dipterocarpaceae Shorea        0.0512  1.51

    Bark Biomass Models

    bk = a_4 * dsob^b_41

    • bk [kg] - bark biomass

    • dsob [cm] - diameter of the stem, outside bark at breast height

    Model Parameters

      family           genus             a_4  b_41
1 <NA>             <NA>          0.0154   2.44
2 Dipterocarpaceae <NA>          0.00399  2.84
3 Dipterocarpaceae Dipterocarpus 0.00116  3.19
4 Dipterocarpaceae Shorea        0.320    1.47
